extendedInfo.description: This app contains a set of tiny tools: a flashlight, a unit converter, a timer, a stopwatch, a compass a bubble level, a calculator, a magnifying glass (Android 2.2+ required), a mirror (Android 2.3+ and front camera required) and a ruler.Each tool does what it is supposed to do. There's no space for special effects like 3D compass, talking level, psychedelic flashlight etc: the goal is to have a lightweight, fast and easy to use set of tools, one "tap" away from your home screen.This app is half the size of a common "standalone tool" like a compass, a flashlight or a magnifying glass. This way you'll save a lot of disk space. You'll save network consumption too, not only for the first download but for every update too.It doesn't require network access, the permission to write on your flash memory or the permission to read your contacts.Suggestions, like new features to implement, new tools etc. are welcome. If you want to contribute a translation, please let us know by sending us an email ;)If you find a bug, please contact us using the "Report a bug" main menu function.Note: if you write a comment on the Android Market without sending us an email, it's difficult for us to fix the problem, because usually we need some information (such as smartphone type and version, a way to replicate the problem, etc.).Note:- Depending on the hardware capabilities of your device, some tools may not be shown- The permission to use the camera is required in order to turn on the camera flash LED. Some devices (for instance the Google Nexus S) don't light the flash LED if the camera is not running. If you check the most popular flashlight apps, you'll find out that they all require this permission. Swiss Army Knife doesn't shoot any photos, doesn't save multimedia info onto the flash card and doesn't send anything via the internet: it doesn't require network permissions at all.

reviews.title: This is the best app
reviews.comment: It does just what it claims to do. No intrusive push notices and works flawlessly.  Sure the  flashlight could be a bit brighter but all in all its a fantastic app. I highly recommend it.
reviews.author: chris williams

reviews.title: Great app, put it on all your devices
reviews.comment: This app is awesome.  I have it on all my android devices.  With all the functionality that is included, I was able to delete a number of other apps and save space.  I used to have a dedicated calculator, compass, bubble level, timer, and stopwatch.  Now I just have Swiss Army Knife and a bunch of free space.  And compared to other \"toolbox\" type apps, this one rocks on size using less than 20% of the memory (this app is about 750K while the others are 3.5M+).  I recommend this app to everyone I know who has an android device.  The developer is very responsive to bugs and feature requests.  Awesome for a FREE app!!!
reviews.author: James Brown

reviews.title: So convenient all in one
reviews.comment: Very good idea. All together and each one very good. For instance the ruler is very precise after calibration. Stopwatch with laptimes. Multiple countdown timers. Best scientific calculator around, just like my old casio! Finally I can uninstall lots of other little apps and get back my phones memory for something bigger. Thanks.
reviews.author: Andy Tate

reviews.title: Ray
reviews.comment: I must thank you for this application, it\'s just wonderful. One thing which I would like you to add is measuring of speed and a warning buzz or alarm if you exceed a set speed. I love speeding on the highway and needs something to remind me. My car has no capabilities to do the same.
reviews.author: Dawo Ray

reviews.title: Awesomeness
reviews.comment: I love everything!! Could you add a tally counter? That\'s the only tool I need/use that I have to have a separate app for. There are plenty tally counter apps out there but adding it to this one would make it beyond amazing!! Thank you for all your hard work :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works...
reviews.comment: Works well on Galaxy Note 2. However I have other programs that do this & more. Still, good effort, especially allowing individual settings for each tool. Has potential, depending if developer decides on your basis Swiss Army knife or the Champion!
reviews.author: Doug Jacobson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is simply the best app of its kind. I especially love the bubble level and compas. I mean i got a galaxy y( which is one of the cheapest android) and the results are 99% acurate. I usually recomend it to anybody who i know using android....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This app exeeds all possible expectations. Especially the unit converter which has a great interface
reviews.author: Eoin Cregan

reviews.title: Great collection of tools
reviews.comment: It\'s UI may not be the most beautiful, but it\'s reliable, it\'s trustworthy, it\'s fast, every function works, and on top of that : it\'s free. Truly free. No ads, no in app purchases, nope. Love it.

reviews.title: Gr8 App but a suggestion
reviews.comment: If you could add a task killer also it would be awesome

reviews.comment: Deserves 10 \342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205. A must have app. One of the best. Don\'t waste time to even think about anything else.

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: I like the magnifier, compass, calculator (my stock calculator does not have a % or memory button but this one does) and the unit conversion is usefully given I live in Asia and need to convert things often. Everything works great, Well Done! Thanks!

reviews.title: Great utility app
reviews.comment: Very useful utility tools in one app.  Can now delete other apps that only provided bits & pieces of what this app delivers & save space too. Thank you!

reviews.comment: A real great tool I love it so easy to use and the flash light it\'s amazingly bright the only reason for four because the compass is gone but other than that it\'s amazing would recommend it to anyone\tLove it

reviews.title: Can\'t live without my knife
reviews.comment: It has everything like a converter, stop watch, flash light, timer, and even a magnify glass (which I looked at it and asked myself \'what would I need that for, and I\'m telling you out comes in handy). Everything you need under one app.
